CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT( OperatingCompany__c ) = 'Plantyn', CASE(ShippingCostMethodNS__c , 'Based on order total', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId, '193','193'), 'Based on weight Domestic', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'194','194'), 'Based on weight non Domestic', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'195','195'), 'Shipping Cost Exempt', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'196','196'), '' ), IF (TEXT( OperatingCompany__c ) = 'Noordhoff',
CASE(ShippingCostMethodNS__c, 'Based on order total', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'7521','36406'), 'Based on weight Domestic', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'7522','36407'), 'Based on weight non Domestic', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'7523','36408'), 'Shipping Cost Exempt', IF( $Organization.Id = $Label.devOrgId,'7524','20760'), '' ) , IF (TEXT( OperatingCompany__c ) = 'Liber', CASE(ShippingCostMethodNS__c, 'Based on order total', IF($Organization.Id = $Label.uatOrgId,'7528','8260'), 'Based on weight Domestic', IF($Organization.Id = $Label.uatOrgId,'7526','8258'), 'Based on weight non Domestic', IF($Organization.Id = $Label.uatOrgId,'7527','8259'), 'Shipping Cost Exempt', IF($Organization.Id = $Label.uatOrgId,'7525','8256'),'' ) , '' ) ) )
CustomField.label: Shipping Cost Method NS Id
